title: Starter Riven
body: Whats the best way to build Riven for somebody starting out on her ( not going to play in ranked) The best item, mastery and rune builds for sombody thays new to her. Any tips for getting better with her? ( dont say dont play her)

replies.body:
Hello the top win rate build for riven is {{item:3071}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3139}}  (run cd per lvl blues to get 40% cd). another build path is {{item:3071}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3053}}. 

Here is a link to a website that will help you out http://champion.gg/champion/riven 

Here is a video about trading in lane https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dmrYIpDWGF8
Got to challenger with this build, vouched
are people so sad that they have to downvote jokes
works better on fiora and yas, but still effective

The best start for Riven is picking up the Seppuku Knife first item :^)

Okay but really, get 40% CDR as quickly as possible (A good way is to get flat CDR Blues and a Quint, {{item:3071}} or {{item:3142}} and {{item:3158}}) and get as much AD as possible from there. Learn how to Orbwalk (that is, move between auto attacks) and how to Animation Cancel (move or auto attack before the animation finishes but after the effect itself has applied) and you'll be 1v3 Triple Killing in no time!

She's all about  utilizing her passive so it's important to buy ad items. She has horrible hp regen which is why people build life steal on her so often. 
The best way is to really practice jumping over terrain. and comboing monsters and farming. Things come in time and it's down to your preferences on what is needed to build.
Youshould check out the Riven Mains discord channel, they'll gladly give you tips on builds and how to play vs different people: https://discord.gg/kqVewDN
